topic.title: Chapter 1
topic.shortdesc: The three little pigs set out to build their own homes. Each pig chooses different materials: straw, sticks, and bricks.

section.title: Introduction
section.p: Once upon a time, three piggies and their mother lived in the forest. When the piggies became adults, their mother told them they would have to move out of her house and build their own home.

section.title: First piggie
section.p: The first piggie was very lazy. He built a house made of straw, which only took him the day. He laughed at his other siblings taking more time to build their home.

section.title: Second piggie
section.p: The second piggie was lazy, but not as lazy as the first pig. He built his house with sticks, which took him a week. While the first piggie was laughing at his brother, the second pig laughed at the third brother, who was taking longer than both of his siblings.

section.title: Third piggie
section.p: The last piggie was a very hard worker. He created his home out of bricks, which took a month. He also incorporated a fireplace that he could cook over, because the third little piggie loved to cook. While both of his siblings were laughing at him, the last little piggie knew that his home was the best.
